channel.title: Letting Users Connect
channel.description:
Ok, well I successfully got my server running, I went to whatsmyip.org, got my ip, and my friends cannot connect using it. This server is running and I port forwarded using portforward.com
I'd like to know what else I need to do
BTW I am using Windows Vista.

item.title: Letting Users Connect
item.dc:creator: @sinzscapeserver sinzscapeserver
item.description:
@sinzscapeserver wrote:

unblock 43594 In the Firewall And make sure your firewall allows the Java Process to Connect to the internet

Read full topic
